verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: swat] [V: called] [ARG1: to police standoff with armed suspect] [ARGM-LOC: in youngstown] [ARG0: a man] surrendered to police early tuesday after a more than two - hour standoff at his home on the south side of youngstown commander elberty youngstown police swat robert lundy youngstown ohio
